abstract: Bonuses of more than $1 million apiece went out to 696 people last year, New York’s attorney general said.
snippet: Bonuses of more than $1 million apiece went out to 696 people last year, New York’s attorney general said.
lead_paragraph: For nearly 700 lucky Merrill Lynch employees, 2008 was a million-dollar year, even though the brokerage firm lost $27 billion.

headline.main: Nearly 700 at Merrill in Million-Dollar Club
headline.print_headline: Nearly 700 at Merrill In Million-Dollar Club

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Louise Story

abstract: Here are some numbers that Bank of America Chief Executive Ken Lewis is likely to hear about when he goes before lawmakers this morning.

headline.main: Big Bonuses for Many at Merrill, Cuomo Says
